Package zebra4j

Interface AttributeType

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllDifferentType, BasicAttributeType
public interface AttributeType
A type attribute for a person like a "name", "pet" or if the person is a criminal

AttributeType is used as members of sets and as keys in maps so implementations must implement equals and hashCode. Singleton implementations are fine because Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode() work correctly for singletons.

When defining custom attributes, consider using BasicAttributeType or extending the abstract AllDifferentType.

See Also:
Attribute

    • questionSentencePart

      String questionSentencePart​(Locale locale)
      Returns the pattern for questions "about" this attribute type
      Parameters:
      locale -
      Returns:
      a pattern for String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) with a single placeholder for the attribute of the person the question is towards.
      See Also:
      Question

    • getAttributes

      List<Attribute> getAttributes​(int count)
      Return some attributes of this type.

      Used when generating solutions.

      Parameters:
      count - how many attributes to return
      Returns:
      A subset of the attributes of this type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if count is larger than the number of all possible attributes of this type

    • describeSet

      String describeSet​(Collection<Attribute> subset, Locale locale)
      Describe the given set of attributes in the form of sentence, in the given locale, describing a rule for solving a puzzle.

      The sentence is in the form: People's names are Mary, Jane and Steve.

      Parameters:
      subset - the set of attributes of this type, used in a puzzle
      locale -
      Returns:
      a sentence string, not null.
